paragraphs.body: Shouldn't it be noted somewhere in the body of thhe text that the affiliates should have something to do with either Nickelodeon or Avatar: The Last Airbender/Legend of Korra? Or at least have some distinctive tie between the World of Avatar, and the affiliate? Rassilon of Old (Talk - TTFF - Teru)  12:42, April 26, 2011 (UTC)
